description: To create a LIVECODE file, select File → New Mainstack , a window, or Card , should appear, make your edits, select File → Save or Save As... or Share This Stack... , name your file, choose the save location, and click Save .
To open a LIVECODE file, simply click the file, or select File → Open Stack... or Open Recent File , navigate to your LIVECODE file, select it, and click Open .
